EmailTemplate.name: Resend CS Contract
EmailTemplate.subject: A New BlueWave Community Solar Contract is Coming Your Way
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Opportunity.Name},
Thanks for signing your BlueWave Community Solar contract, but it appears your contract has <enter error in contract>.
In order to fix this issue and ensure we have accurate information for you on file, we will re-send you a new contract shortly. Please resign and resubmit the new contract. In the meantime, you will receive a voided copy of your previous contract.
Please let us know if you have any questions, we're happy to help.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
